attributes.action: Make winter fuel payments automatic instead of payment on application
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Around 2.5 Million people are inhabiting only a small part of their home this winter and each year around 25,000 people die as a result of a cold related illness.  Approximately £4.5 billion in benefits remains unspent by the Government due to confusion over the method of making a claim.
